TopicTitle: Remind me to say something more creative here at some point in the future

Articles.Content:
Ok, after that long-winded title, Hi.

I stole, uh borrowed this name from a suggestion in the Voyage to the Planets, by Czokletmuss. (if the person who made that suggestion is reading this, sorry)

I've been lurking/actually playing for nine or-so months, decided to say hello . (Started playing exactly* in the week before Whackjob, for reference)

Here's to an awesome community!

*approximatley

Edited March 21, 2014 by The Silent Majority
Welcome to the forums! : 3 Enjoy your stay.
Welcome aboard! Here you'll always find people ready to help, no matter the problem. Happy launchings!
welcome to the forums! Your name reminds me of Futurama when it was meant to be the soylent majority
Howdy! Hope you enjoy the community as much as the game itself. I sure do.
Welcome aboard, we're all glad to have you!

Okay, I found the person who suggested the name, it was Cal'Mihe.

Also thank you for the warm welcome
